document_data.name: Jessek
document_data.mainbody: '''Jessek''', also known as '''Destruction''' was an [[undead]] [[beholder]] who roamed the [[Lowerdark]] of the [[Underdark]] with his companions, the [[dread wraith]] [[Death (dread wraith)|Death]] and the [[mummy]] [[Disease (mummy)|Disease]].Described as a "trio of undead", in a subsection focusing on [[undead]], it is implied that Jessek is undead as well, but his actual type is not given.
document_data.History:
[[Hamezaar]], the [[vampire]] ruler of the [[Boneyard (Earthroot)|Boneyard]], once worked to recruit Death, Disease, and Destruction to his undead armies, but they declined for lack of interest.

''Circa'' [[1372 DR]], the trio were searching for an [[annihilator]], intending to capture and control it with the aid of Jessek's ''[[charm monster]]'' eye-ray power. After they had an annihilator, Jessek wanted to hunt down and slay the outcast beholder [[Tobulux]] for being an abomination, as well as his [[illithid]] companion [[Ralayn]] who would oppose them.
